means: 雏菊（花）( daisy的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: If you're handy with a needle you could brighten up your sweater with daisies.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你针线活做得好，可以在自己的毛衣上绣几朵雏菊做点缀。

sentence.Network_en: Another year of this idle life, I'll be pushing up the daisies.
sentence.Network_cn: 再闲上这么一年, 我就要入土了.

sentence.Network_en: Old John has been pushing up the daisies for years now.

entry.def: A daisy is a small wild flower with a yellow centre and white petals.

example.en: h is better to push up the daisies than to suffer.
He pushed up daisies about a year ago.
example.zh: 他大约在一年前撒手人寰了。
